title: Anyone has Any Clue about what the placement stats are right now
content: Any placement stats likes percentages placed for cse medians averages.

comments.body: Are we allowed to go to the placement office and ask them directly?
Ig juniors taking admission can ask
Oh time to make some 2029 PESU aspirants my friends
Just see the placement office board, u will see the stats yourself
Are we allowed to go inside?
Animesh Sir used to maintain updated stats on a whiteboard in EC campus, not sure if he still does.
shud be there in EC too
Yea just go to the placement office and check the notice board. Or u can go talk to somshekar sir
